With a tilt tension knob, you can customize the tension to your preference. Experience comfort and flexibility with this reclining office chair, perfect for your home office desk.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Mo Maek Big and Tall Office Chair 400lbs, Large Wide Seat Home Office Desk Chairs, Office Chair Lumbar Support? GOOD GIFTS FOR THE FOLLOWING HOLIDAY: CHRISTMAS DAY OR BIRTHDAY FOR YOUR BOYS TEENS ADULTS BOSS 𝐁𝐢𝐠 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐓𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐑𝐞𝐜𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫,𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐖𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐅𝐨𝐨𝐭 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐭 2024 NEW Arrivals Essential high back PU leather chair for all purposes. 𝐁𝐢𝐠 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐓𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐯𝐲 𝐏𝐞𝐨𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝟒𝟎𝟎𝐥𝐛𝐬 𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐒𝐞𝐚𝐭 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐫𝐚 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭,This big office chair is designed to accommodate the needs of larger individuals and provide them with all the comfort they need. It is a high office chair with a generously-sized, breathable seat cushion with elastic spring pack , and adjustable height and rock back and forth function that enable easy customization for both big and tall users. This Executive office chair offers a 360-degree swivel function for easy maneuverability. The seat cushion is made with high-density sponge filling, providing comfort and breathability. With 25 individual spring pockets, it offers superior comfort compared to regular chairs. The adjustable padded armrests allow for proper arm support and relaxation. Additionally, it features a retractable thickened cushioned footrest, ensuring relaxation and comfort for your legs.
Executive Office Chair, Ergonomic desk chair with foot rest,Your Best Choice For Home and Office Occasions

The high-end 360° rotatable wheels have strong wear-resistant and durable properties and quietness Retractable footrest allows for a more comfortable rest for your legs. Double-layer high-density sponge filling, using 25 independent spring packages, has excellent bearing capacity, no problem if the weight is within 400lb. The soft and thick backrest relieves work fatigue, and the first-class experience of an airplane makes life more comfortable.

Need More Reasons? ✔ Tall Adjustable Office Chair – Adjusted Arms, Height/Back Adjustable, Rocking Function ✔ Breathable Bonded Leather, Thick Padded Back And Seat Cushion – Comfy Chair ✔ Fast, Easy Assembly With Simple Manual What You Get: 1 * Big Tall Office Chair 400lbs 1 * Instructions Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This chair is a big deal! I'm in IT and I sit in front of my computer screens for many hours almost every day. I've tried so many different chairs and all have become uncomfortable by the end of the day. Some even leave me in pain. So when I see one that looks like it would be comfortable, I order it.I ordered this one from Amazon and assembled it as soon as it arrived. It is big and heavy. There are relatively few parts that are easily assembled using the 19 bolts (if my memory serves me right) and the hex key provided. No other tools are needed. The instructions, while brief are adequate for even a novice. Assembly took me less than 1/2 hr. and no assistance was needed.The chair is tall, wide and very comfortable. The padding on the back, seat and foot rest is stiff but pliant. the chair height, armrest height and back angle are all adjustable and the footrest slides out and flips into place from under the seat. The leather like vinyl seems durable and the contrast stitching is very handsome.I've been working for several hours straight now and I feel very relaxed in this chair. This one seems like it'll work out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving my new office chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair took me about 45 minutes to put together by myself so having an extra set of hands might help, especially when having to flip it over at times to install the arms and also aligning the main lever/mechanism into the wheel base.I used my battery operated drill driver with this instead of using the provided allen wrench when first getting each bolt set into the chair, but then used the wrench for hand tightening at the end to prevent stripping the head of the bolts.The material feels high quality and the stitching all looks well put together.The padding is real thick and the chair is very comfortable and may be adjusted to swing back easily or with more tension (or not at all). The chair also comes with an additional leg piece that slides underneath and out of the way when not in use as well as a pillow should you want to take a rest or use it as a lumbar device.The set did have a broken piece when arriving with the telescoping cover and rubber gasket but there were additional gaskets in the tool pack and the cover does not affect the chair going up and down so it was not a major concern for me in my home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for big and tall users
reviews.reviewText: My son is six three and a bigger guy so finding comfortable computer chairs can be difficult. This chair is geared toward a big and tall clientele. This is the perfect size for my kiddo and is extreamly comfortable for him to work in. This chair was easy to put together and comes with all necessary parts. The foot rest is a nice addition and makes it even more comfortable for gaming. The price is high but you are getting a chair that is made specifically for a bigger man. Very comfortable and looks very professional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, but a few things to note, seat cushion is a major issue
reviews.reviewText: The seat cushion is firm in the middle where you sit, but less firm on the edges so you may tend to sit to one side. This is a bigger issue than I initially thought.Assembly was straight forward and easy until the last step (Attach backrest to seat bottom)- I attempted to slide this in but the backrest spring makes this gap narrower than expected (even with the mounting bracket “I” adjusted all the way out)- I wrapped the plastic back around the bottom of the backrest and it did slide in much easier- Some minor tweaks to get all the bolts to align and tightened- I then removed the plastic coverThere is an extra pillow that is not shown on the product pageIncludes the footrest which moves smoothly, I just have not really had a use for itThe arm rests are ambidextrous (fit on either side), they are adjustable with 7 height optionsThe pneumatic lift raises the chair to typical heights, high enough for me to be comfortable at my deskCost at time of review $299.00Overall, I really do like this chair, it is very comfortable. The seat cushion firmness issue is a bit annoying. After a few days, you really notice the seat cushion and I end up not sitting straight up as I am sliding off to a side

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable but its a big chair
reviews.reviewText: Before you consider this chair make sure you have the space. It's a very big chair and easily takes up some space, i got this as i have chronic back pain and work from home in front of a computer. For me the most important thing is support and comfortability. This chair hits those keys and provides more, the chair is really nice and the materials are great, the padding is stiff but still pliant to fit you and the stitching looks great and adds some fanciness to the chair. The leg rest works great and supports me easily and can be put away very easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Impressively, the MO MAEK Desk Office Chair combines comfort and functionality. Its high back design offers plenty of support, which makes it perfect for extended desk usage. By ensuring good posture and reducing strain, the ergonomic features increase productivity. A footrest improves comfort and enables me to unwind and maintain ideal posture. The elegant black leather upholstery gives any office environment a refined touch. All things considered, this executive chair is a great option for people looking for comfort and style in their workstation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this office chair for my desk, and it's okay. The light grey color is nice, and it's comfortable to sit in. The high back provides good support. However, the footrest is a bit wobbly, and the chair can be a little squeaky. If you need an average office chair for your desk, this one might work for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is extremely uncomfortable. It’s large and able to accommodate heavy loads. However, it is uncomfortable and after sitting in it for a while, your neck and back hurts. The leather is brutally hard and un-accommodating. It is stiff, and not easy to clean. This is a chair that I recommend for those looking for something that they will sitting in for long periods of time. However, if you don’t use your office or desk that often. It may be okay for you.
